entry.title: $2500 // Private Backyard, Zero Brokerage Fee, Feb 1st
entry.content:
Need a new tenet to occupy our apartment starting Feb 1st.

HOT NO BROKERAGE FEE 1 BEDROOM! Great location - less than 2 min walk to new Q station at 72nd street! This apartment is beautiful...also located in a well-maintained building in the UES, close to tasty restaurants, nightlife, grocery stores, shopping and more. The apartment is recently renovated: the kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a dishwasher, ample cabinet space and a marble breakfast bar. Comfortable living room that opens up to the kitchen and features exposed brick throughout. Excellent closet space with overhead storage. Queen size bedroom that opens up to your private backyard.
